welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Knox, where history and charm meet! Get ready to discover the famous military base, breathtaking landscapes, and local treasures. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Godman AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Godman AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Louisville International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Louisville International Airport serves mostly regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bowman Field Airport houses the check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates for all flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Bowman Field Airport caters to private and corporate jets, offering luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the airport.
